attributes.action: More funding for mental health services in England.
attributes.additional_details: As the Government are responsible for the funding and campaigning of mental health services I would like to see improvement within those settings. The staff are underfunded and there has been a massive increase in people needing to access treatment. And without this treatment avaliable people are suffering.
attributes.background: There needs to be an increase in funding in mental health services as there is a current rise in mental health issues and services are lacking funding which enables people to get effective treatment.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition that has a very similar ask:

Increase funding and reduce waiting times for mental health services

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705221
